Line-Intensity Mapping

  • Forecasting [C II] line-intensity mapping measurements between the end of reionization and the epoch of galaxy assembly[arXiv]

    Dongwoo T. Chung, Marco P. Viero, Sarah E. Church, and Risa H. Wechsler
    arXiv (2018)

  • Cross-correlating Carbon Monoxide Line-intensity Maps with Spectroscopic and Photometric Galaxy Surveys[ApJ]

    Dongwoo T. Chung, Marco P. Viero, Sarah E. Church, Risa H. Wechsler et al.
    Astrophysical Journal (2018)

  • A Foreground Masking Strategy for [C II] Intensity Mapping Experiments Using Galaxies Selected by Stellar Mass and Redshift[ApJ]

    Guochao Sun, Lorenzo Moncelsi, Marco P. Viero, Marta B. Silva et al.
    Astrophysical Journal (2018)

  • On Estimation of Contamination from Hydrogen Cyanide in Carbon Monoxide Line-intensity Mapping[ApJ]

    Dongwoo T. Chung, Tony Y. Li, Marco P. Viero, Sarah E. Church, Risa H. Wechsler
    Astrophysical Journal (2017)

  • Line-Intensity Mapping: 2017 Status Report[arXiv]

    Ely D. Kovetz, Marco P. Viero, Adam Lidz, Laura Newburgh, Mubdi Rahman, Eric Switzer, Marc Kamionkowski et al.
    arXiv (2017)

Cosmic Infrared Background

  • Measurements of the Cross-spectra of the Cosmic Infrared and Microwave Backgrounds from 95 to 1200 GHz[ApJ]

    Marco P. Viero, Christian L. Reichardt and the SPT Collaboration
    Astrophysical Journal (2019)

  • HerMES: Current Cosmic Infrared Background Estimates Can Be Explained by Known Galaxies and Their Faint Companions at z < 4[ApJ]

    Marco P. Viero, Lorenzo Moncelsi, Ryan Quadri et al.
    Astrophysical Journal (2015)

  • The Herschel Stripe 82 Survey (HerS): Maps and Early Catalog[ApJ]

    Marco P. Viero, Veronica Asboth, Isaac G. Roseboom, Lorenzo Moncelsi, Gaelen Marsden, Erin Mentuch Cooper, Michael Zemcov et al.
    Astrophysical Journal (2014)

  • HerMES: The Contribution to the Cosmic Infrared Background from Galaxies Selected by Mass and Redshift[ADS]

    Marco P. Viero, Lorenzo Moncelsi, Ryan F. Quadri et al.
    Astrophysical Journal (2013)

  • A Cosmic Microwave Background Lensing Mass Map and Its Correlation with the Cosmic Infrared Background[ADS]

    Gil P. Holder, Marco P. Viero, Oliver Zahn and the SPT Collaboration
    Astrophysical Journal (2013)

  • HerMES: Cosmic Infrared Background Anisotropies and the Clustering of Dusty Star-forming Galaxies[ADS]

    Marco P. Viero, Lingyu Wang, Michael Zemcov et al.
    Astrophysical Journal (2013)

  • Measuring star formation in high-z massive galaxies: a mid-infrared to submillimetre study of the GOODS NICMOS Survey sample[ADS]

    Marco P. Viero, Lorenzo Moncelsi, Erin Mentuch, Fernando Buitrago et al.
    Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society (2012)

  • Correlations in the (Sub)millimeter Background from ACT x BLAST[ADS]

    Amir Hajian, Marco P. Viero et al.
    Astrophysical Journal (2012)

  • BLAST: Correlations in the Cosmic Far-Infrared Background at 250, 350, and 500 μm Reveal Clustering of Star-forming Galaxies[ADS]

    Marco P. Viero
    Astrophysical Journal (2009)

  • Correlations in the Cosmic Far-Infrared Background at 250, 350, and 500 µm Reveal Clustering of Star-Forming Galaxies[pdf]

    Marco P. Viero
